name: New Dawn (itch) (MIUSOFT)
description:
(Play using a PC is recommended)

🔹 PC Controls
W , A , S , D keys to move
Q - Use or Drop Gun
Left Click to Shoot

🔹 Mobile Controls
 Tap on the screen to Shoot

🎮 Story
The Robot is a friendly robotic character that helps protect the Earth from aliens and zombies, ensuring a new dawn for humanity. Players control the robot character and guide it towards creating a new beginning for humanity.

----------------
I haven't added many sounds and quality animations, or graphics because of time limitations, sorry for my fault 😓 (It's just 1 level, sorry for that)
